definitions.definition: Agitation ; the state of being perturbed
A small change in a physical system , or more broadly any definable system (such as a biological or economic system)
Variation in an orbit due to the influence of external bodies

main_definition: ( uncountable ) Agitation ; the state of being perturbed
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) A small change in a physical system , or more broadly any definable system (such as a biological or economic system)
( countable , astronomy , physics ) Variation in an orbit due to the influence of external bodies
